caption.title: Descriptive statistics of the Influenzanet data by country.
caption.p: Here, we present a few statistics regarding the available Influenzanet data for each country; (i) the number of seasons available, (ii) the average number of participants per country in a season, (iii) the average number of surveys of weekly surveys, (iv) the average percentage of surveys with at least one symptom (v) the average number of surveys per participant per season, and (vi) the average number of weeks within a single season.
Click here for additional data file.
